long_description: The Nite Ize iPhone 5 screen protectors help preserve your screen's crisp resolution, guarding it from everyday wear and tear. Smudge- and fingerprint-proof screen protectors are easy to install and help safeguard your screen from scuffs and scratches while preserving sharpness and clarity. The Nite Ize iPhone 5 screen protectors come with a microfiber cleaning cloth and installation instructions.
short_description: The Nite Ize iPhone 5 screen protectors help preserve your screen's crisp resolution, guarding it from everyday wear and tear.
